query.statement:
SELECT HEX(CURRENT DATE) ceSDJbjd ,HEX(CURRENT DATE)||LEFT(HEX(CURRENT TIME),4) ceSDJupd ,'' ceSDJsnm ,'' ceSDJhdm ,'' ceSDJnap ,POSID CESDJPJT ,right(posid_1, 3) CESDJHNO
,(SELECT zsite_nm FROM SAPHEE.zmaster01 WHERE posid=#PJT# AND MANDT=#G_MANDT#) zsite_nm ,(SELECT addr1||addr2||'('||zsite_tel||')' FROM SAPHEE.zmaster01 WHERE posid=#PJT# AND MANDT=#G_MANDT#) ADDR ,(SELECT namet FROM SAPHEE.zpst0011 WHERE MANDT=#G_MANDT# AND temno=R02.temno AND RETIF = '') NAMET ,(SELECT name1 FROM SAPHEE.zmmt012 WHERE MANDT=#G_MANDT# AND lifnr=R02.lifnr) NAME1 ,zspec1 ,zspec7 ,zspec11
,'' CESDJJJX ,'' CESDJSAY ,'' CESDJREQ
FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 R02 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND right(posid_1, 3) = #HNO# AND POSID = #PJT#
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
